ds.graphics
Class PolyShape

java.lang.Object
  ds.graphics.Shape
      ds.graphics.PolyShape

public class PolyShape
extends Shape

A derived class the extends Shape with regular polygon objects that are specified by a length and the number of sides with the base point at the center of the figure.

Constructor Detail

PolyShape

public PolyShape()
Default constructor creates an instance with zero sides and length and color LIGHTGRAY.

PolyShape

public PolyShape(double x,
                 double y,
                 int n,
                 double length,
                 int c)
Creates an instance with base point (x,y), n sides of length len and color c.

Parameters:
x - x-coordinate of the base point.
y - y-coordinate of the base point.
n - number of sides in the regular polygon.
length - length of each side.
c - fill color when drawing the polygon.
Method Detail

setN

public void setN(int n)
Updates the number of sides to have new value n.

Parameters:
n - new number of sides for this polygon.

getN

public int getN()
Returns the number of sides in this polygon.

Returns:
number of sides.

setLength

public void setLength(double length)
Updates the length of each side to have new length len.

Parameters:
length - new length of a side.

getLength

public double getLength()
Returns the length of each side in this polygon.

Returns:
length of a side.
